mapper.select: select level_no, level_name, turnover, round(turnover / total_turnover * 100,2) percent from (select new_table1.first_no level_no,new_table1.first_name level_name,sum(new_table2.temp_turnover) turnover from (select first_level.level_no first_no,first_level.level_name first_name,third_level.level_no third_no from first_level left join second_level on first_level.level_no=second_level.first_level_no left join third_level on second_level.level_no=third_level.second_level_no) new_table1 left join (select third_level,sum(turnover) temp_turnover from product group by third_level) new_table2 on new_table1.third_no=new_table2.third_level group by new_table1.first_no order by new_table1.first_no) new_table2,(select sum(turnover) total_turnover from product) new_table3

select level_no,level_name,turnover,round(turnover / total_turnover * 100,2) percent from (select second_level.level_no,second_level.level_name,turnover from (SELECT second_level_no,sum(temp_turnover) turnover from (select * from third_level where second_level_no in (select level_no from second_level where first_level_no=#{levelNo})) new_table1 left join (select third_level,sum(turnover) temp_turnover from product GROUP BY third_level) new_table2 on new_table1.level_no=new_table2.third_level group BY second_level_no) new_table3 left join second_level on new_table3.second_level_no=second_level.level_no order by level_no) new_table4,(select sum(turnover) total_turnover from product where third_level in (select level_no from third_level where second_level_no in (select level_no from second_level where first_level_no=#{levelNo}))) new_table5

select level_no,level_name,sum(turnover) turnover from (select * from third_level where second_level_no=(select level_no from second_level where level_name=#{levelName})) new_table1 left join product on new_table1.level_no=product.third_level group by level_no order by level_no
